# VS Code Extensions Analysis for Gavra Android Project

## ‚úÖ ESSENTIAL EXTENSIONS (Keep)
- `dart-code.dart-code` - Core Dart language support
- `dart-code.flutter` - Flutter development tools
- `github.copilot` & `github.copilot-chat` - AI coding assistance
- `eamodio.gitlens` - Git integration and history
- `github.vscode-pull-request-github` - GitHub integration
- `pkief.material-icon-theme` - File icons
- `usernamehw.errorlens` - Inline error display
- `sonarsource.sonarlint-vscode` - Code quality analysis

## ü§î POTENTIALLY UNNECESSARY EXTENSIONS

### Firebase/Firestore Extensions:
- `hasanakg.firebase-snippets` - ‚ö†Ô∏è **REMOVE** - Basic snippets, not essential
- `peterhdd.firebase-firestore-snippets` - ‚ö†Ô∏è **REMOVE** - Duplicate functionality
- `toba.vsfire` - ‚ö†Ô∏è **REMOVE** - Firebase tools, redundant
- `zerotask.firebase-configuration-schema` - ‚ö†Ô∏è **REMOVE** - JSON schema, not critical

### Web Development Extensions:
- `bradlc.vscode-tailwindcss` - ‚ùå **REMOVE** - Not used in Flutter project
- `graphql.vscode-graphql-syntax` - ‚ö†Ô∏è **MAYBE KEEP** - Used for GraphQL in pubspec.yaml

### Dart/Flutter Helper Extensions:
- `alexisvt.flutter-snippets` - ‚ö†Ô∏è **REMOVE** - Overlaps with official Flutter extension
- `gornivv.vscode-flutter-files` - ‚ö†Ô∏è **REMOVE** - File generation, not essential
- `nash.awesome-flutter-snippets` - ‚ö†Ô∏è **REMOVE** - Overlaps with official Flutter extension
- `luanpotter.dart-import` - ‚ö†Ô∏è **REMOVE** - Import organization, nice-to-have
- `jeroen-meijer.pubspec-assist` - ‚ö†Ô∏è **REMOVE** - Pubspec help, not essential

### Utility Extensions:
- `chflick.firecode` - ‚ùå **REMOVE** - Unknown functionality
- `codezombiech.gitignore` - ‚ö†Ô∏è **REMOVE** - GitIgnore templates, not essential
- `dotjoshjohnson.xml` - ‚ö†Ô∏è **REMOVE** - XML support, minimal use in Flutter
- `github.vscode-github-actions` - ‚ö†Ô∏è **REMOVE** - No GitHub Actions in project
- `mintlify.document` - ‚ö†Ô∏è **REMOVE** - Documentation tool, not essential
- `ms-vscode.powershell` - ‚úÖ **KEEP** - Windows PowerShell support
- `pflannery.vscode-versionlens` - ‚ö†Ô∏è **REMOVE** - Package version info, nice-to-have
- `rangav.vscode-thunder-client` - ‚ö†Ô∏è **REMOVE** - API testing, can use external tools
- `redhat.vscode-yaml` - ‚úÖ **KEEP** - YAML support for pubspec.yaml
- `ziyasal.vscode-open-in-github` - ‚ö†Ô∏è **REMOVE** - GitHub shortcuts, not essential
